question: What is the purpose of an opening tag in HTML?

choices.answer: Indicates the beginning of an element
Indicates the end of an element
Specifies the source URL for an element
Provides alternative text for an element

question: Which type of elements do not require a closing tag?

choices.answer: Container elements
Void or self-closing elements
Block-level elements
Inline elements

question: What does the class attribute specify in HTML?

choices.answer: One or more class names for an element
A unique identifier for an element
The source URL for an element
Additional information about an element

question: What does the id attribute provide in HTML?

choices.answer: The source URL for an element
A unique identifier for an element
One or more class names for an element
Additional information about an element

question: What does the src attribute specify in HTML?

choices.answer: One or more class names for an element
A unique identifier for an element
The source URL for an element
Additional information about an element

question: What does the alt attribute provide for images in HTML?

choices.answer: The source URL for an image
The image caption
The image width
Alternative text

question: What does the href attribute specify in HTML?

choices.answer: The URL for hyperlinks
The source URL for images
The placeholder text for input fields
The type of input element

question: What does the title attribute provide in HTML?

choices.answer: The URL for hyperlinks
The source URL for images
The placeholder text for input fields
Additional information displayed as a tooltip
